Saver¶

class simulate.agent.saver.StateSaver(agent)¶

Bases: object

Handles compressing an agent’s state into a small dict for logging or writing to JSON.

initial_state() → dict¶

Gets the initial state of the agent.

Returns:

A dictionary containing the initial state information of the agent.

Return type:

dict

log_state() → dict¶

Returns the current state of the agent, but nicely formatted.

Returns:

A dictionary containing the logged state information of the agent.

Return type:

dict

save_state(topic: int, partners: list, setting: str) → dict¶

Saves only the necessary agent attributes that changed during this conversation.

Parameters:

  • topic (int) – The topic of conversation.

  • partners (list) – The list of partners involved in the conversation.

  • setting (str) – The setting of the conversation (‘one_to_one’ or ‘one_to_all’).

Returns:

A dictionary containing only the necessary agent attributes that changed during this conversation.

Return type:

dict
